content.rendered:
Somon Air is the national air carrier of Tajikistan, which has been successfully operating on the international market since 2008 and is the only airline in the country that joined the IATA (International Air Transport Association). International air transportation and charter flights are the main activities of the airline. The basic airport is the Dushanbe International Airport; the international airports of Khujand and Kulyab are additionally operated. In the fleet of the airline, there are Boeing 737-300, -800 and -900 aircrafts.

 

Somon Air Baggage

Queries handled by Somon Air Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

List of Somon Air Offices:

China – Urumqi
Gemany – Frankfurt
Kazakhstan – Almaty
Russia – Irkutsk
Russia – Kazan
Russia – Krasnodar
Russia – Krasnoyarsk
Russia – Moscow
Russia – Novosibirsk
Russia – Orenburg
Russia – St.petersburg
Russia – Yekaterinburg
Russia – St.petersburg
Tajikistan – Khujand
Tajikistan – Dushanbe
Tajikistan – Khujand
Turkey – Istanbul
Turkey – Istanbul
Turkey – Eminonu, Istanbul
Uae – Deira, Dubai
Uae – Dubai
Uzbekistan – Tashkent

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Somon Air Offices Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Somon Air Offices: (click on the stars below)
